courseName: Automotive Engineering with Electric Vehicles - MSc
facultyName: School of Engineering, Computing and Mathematics
description: Prepare for a career in automotive engineering with a combination of theory and practical, hands-on experience. Our ecosystem of automotive labs doubles as your research and learning space. You’ll have access to facilities including our High Voltage Energy Storage lab, driving simulator, the Joining Technology Research Centre, and #OxfordMetaverse, our virtual reality space.During your time studying Automotive Engineering with Electric Vehicles, you can engage with activities and research groups through your dissertation and extra-curricular activities.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesHome (UK) full time - £9,300 Home part-time - 6,650 International full time - £17,200
